thread.title: Panthers DE Allen returning to lineup vs. Eagles
thread.title_full: Panthers DE Allen returning to lineup vs. Eagles

author: wtopstaff
title: Panthers DE Allen returning to lineup vs. Eagles
text:
Home » News » Sports » NFL » Panthers DE Allen returning… Panthers DE Allen returning to lineup vs. Eagles By The Associated Press October 23, 2015 1:24 pm 
CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Panthers coach Ron Rivera says defensive end Jared Allen will start Sunday night against the Philadelphia Eagles. 
Allen, the NFL’s active career sack leader, missed last week’s game against the Seattle Seahawks with a pinched nerve in his back. Allen suffered the injury in his first game with the Panthers against Tampa Bay prior to the bye week. 
The Panthers have ruled out rookie linebacker Shaq Thompson (knee), defensive end Dwan Edwards (hamstring), fullback Richie Brockel (hamstring) and offensive tackle Daryl Williams (knee) for this week. 
Rivera says linebacker A.J. Klein and cornerback Teddy Williams have cleared the concussion protocol and will play against the Eagles. 
___
